wikimedia-copyright: Gom-sigdim la boolle tengre ku Creative Commons Attribution-ShereAlike License; roaglga go-biisa yile bane Bãngre tʋʋma yinga waage.
wikimedia-copyrightwarning: Ni tedgre bĩngri, fo sake ni[https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wikis/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms _of_Use Bãngre tʋʋma] la fo tulga mi n sake ni fo songre yiibu ni[https://en.wikipedia.org/wikis/wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License CC BY-SA 3.0 License] la ni[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/wikipedia:Text _of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL]. Fo sake ne hyperlink bii URL ya Creative Commons License.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Fo IP aderse ya [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].'''

Gɩdbo maana ni $1 ($2).
Bʋʋm yaa ''$3''.

*Gɩdbo sɩngre $4
*Gɩdbo wakate looga$5
Fo IP aderse nɩng fo sĩ tara masã ya $6
Maan sugre pãasé gʋɩsgo kangã fâa ni sokdse ning fo maane fâa pʋge.

Fo san tagse ti tõnd tudgi n gida fo, kibaré ni wilsi be [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] ânduni maanega pʋge.
Sân pa woto fo sân na sõse gidba, maan sugre [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
